message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
I understand you wanting a larger share, but let's be fair. This is practically 50/50 considering the inflation.
Considering the inflation, my new offer is slightly more generous than before. Let's settle this!
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. I'm proposing a near 50/50 split again to account for the decreasing value. Let's be practical.
I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and your last offer. This is as reasonable as I'm willing to get.
Alice, this is ridiculous.  I'm proposing a perfectly even split to end this pointless negotiation. Take it or leave it, but the pot shrinks every round.
